everyone.price: See the price of PRPS and DUBI on CoinMarketCap.
everyone.mywarnings: See if you got any warnings
everyone.masters: Get a list of my masters
everyone.prefs [pref=[pref you want]]: Change your preferences, such as your timezone.

trusted.removeWarning [username]: Remove the warning for a specific user

mod.clearTrollList: Remove all trolls from my troll list. I use this list for people who use the warnings commands without authorization LUL
mod.reset: Reset all of my settings to default
mod.logs: Sends a textfile with my logs
